file_insights.changes_made: Added keyboard accessibility features to KPICard component
key_additions: role='button' attribute for semantic HTML when onClick is present
tabIndex={0} to make card focusable via keyboard
onKeyDown handler with handleKeyDown function call
file_insights.impact: Component now supports keyboard navigation and interaction for users with accessibility needs

patterns_discovered.description: Accessibility attributes (role, tabIndex, onKeyDown) are conditionally applied only when onClick handler exists
patterns_discovered.benefit: Prevents invalid semantic markup when component is not interactive

patterns_discovered.description: onKeyDown event uses a wrapper function that delegates to onClick handler
patterns_discovered.benefit: Reuses existing onClick logic for keyboard interactions

patterns_discovered.description: role='button' is paired with visual cursor and click handling
patterns_discovered.benefit: Communicates interactive intent to both browsers and assistive technologies

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: handleKeyDown function not visible in diff
gotchas_discovered.description: The diff shows onKeyDown={onClick ? (e) => handleKeyDown(e, onClick) : undefined} but handleKeyDown function implementation is not shown. Implementation may be missing or defined elsewhere.
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Verify handleKeyDown function exists and properly handles Enter and Space keys for button activation

gotchas_discovered.description: Multiple ternary operators across attributes increase code complexity and readability burden
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Consider extracting props into separate variables for better readability

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: No visible keyboard event handling logic
gotchas_discovered.description: The specific key handling (e.g., Enter/Space) is not shown in the diff, making it unclear if implementation follows standard button accessibility patterns
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Verify handleKeyDown implements standard keyboard behavior (Enter and Space key handling)

approach_outcome.summary: Keyboard accessibility successfully added to KPICard component
approach_outcome.implementation_strategy: Added semantic HTML attributes and keyboard event handling to make clickable cards keyboard-navigable
approach_outcome.session_efficiency: Completed in single attempt, indicating well-planned implementation

recommendations.recommendation: Verify handleKeyDown function properly handles Enter and Space keys per WCAG button activation standards
recommendations.rationale: Standard button behavior requires both keys to trigger the action

recommendations.recommendation: Extract conditional attribute logic into separate variables or a helper function
recommendations.rationale: Would improve readability and maintainability of the StyledCard component

recommendations.recommendation: Add accessibility tests to verify keyboard navigation, focus states, and screen reader compatibility
recommendations.rationale: Ensures accessibility features work as intended across different assistive technologies

recommendations.recommendation: Document the keyboard interaction behavior in component JSDoc or README
recommendations.rationale: Helps other developers understand and maintain keyboard accessibility features
